text: Forest Ridge is a rural locality in the Toowoomba Region, Queensland, Australia. In the , Forest Ridge had a population of 49 people. == Geography == The land use is rural residential with large acreage blocks. The Gore Highway forms the southern boundary of the locality. == Education == There are no schools in Forest Ridge. The nearest primary and secondary school to Year 10 is in Millmerran and the nearest secondary school to Year 12 in is Pittsworth. == References == Category:Toowoomba Region Category:Localities in Queensland
title: Forest Ridge, Queensland
